name: Flight Radar
description: The world's most popular flight tracker API which helps you to create Flight tracker application, such as : flightradar24.com

api_methods.name: flights/list-in-boundary
api_methods.description: Helps to list flights, aircrafts in a GEO bounding box, and display them on a map

parameters.name: bl_lng
parameters.description: The bottom left longitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: tr_lat
parameters.description: The top right latitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: bl_lat
parameters.description: The bottom left latitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: tr_lng
parameters.description: The top right longitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The value of 'Code' field returned in .../aircrafts/list endpoint

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: Filter by speed. The format is min,max . Ex : 0,460

parameters.name: airline
parameters.description: The value of 'ICAO' field returned in .../airlines/list endpoint

parameters.name: altitude
parameters.description: Filter by altitude. The format is min,max . Ex : 0,48000

parameters.name: airport
parameters.description: The value of 'icao' field returned in .../airports/list endpoint

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of flights per response (max 300)

utterances.utterance: Show me all flights within the bounding box with bottom left longitude 100.641975, top right latitude 13.771029, bottom left latitude 13.607884, and top right longitude 100.861566.

List flights in the area defined by bottom left longitude 100.641975, top right latitude 13.771029, bottom left latitude 13.607884, and top right longitude 100.861566, with a speed between 200 and 400 knots.
Find flights within the bounding box with bottom left longitude 100.641975, top right latitude 13.771029, bottom left latitude 13.607884, and top right longitude 100.861566, operated by Thai Airways.

Display flights in the area with bottom left longitude 100.641975, top right latitude 13.771029, bottom left latitude 13.607884, and top right longitude 100.861566, flying at an altitude between 30000 and 40000 feet.

List flights within the bounding box with bottom left longitude 100.641975, top right latitude 13.771029, bottom left latitude 13.607884, and top right longitude 100.861566, departing from Suvarnabhumi Airport.

Show flights in the area defined by bottom left longitude 100.641975, top right latitude 13.771029, bottom left latitude 13.607884, and top right longitude 100.861566, with registration number D-AIHV.
List up to 100 flights within the bounding box with bottom left longitude 100.641975, top right latitude 13.771029, bottom left latitude 13.607884, and top right longitude 100.861566.
Find flights within the bounding box with bottom left longitude 100.641975, top right latitude 13.771029, bottom left latitude 13.607884, and top right longitude 100.861566, of type A320.

Show flights in the area with bottom left longitude 100.641975, top right latitude 13.771029, bottom left latitude 13.607884, and top right longitude 100.861566, with a speed between 300 and 500 knots and altitude between 20000 and 30000 feet.

List flights within the bounding box with bottom left longitude 100.641975, top right latitude 13.771029, bottom left latitude 13.607884, and top right longitude 100.861566, operated by Singapore Airlines and departing from Changi Airport.
Show me the list of available aircrafts.
Can you provide a list of all aircrafts tracked by Flight Radar?
Display the aircrafts currently in the air.
What aircrafts are being tracked right now?
List all the aircrafts that are active on Flight Radar.
Give me a list of all the aircrafts available for tracking.
Show the aircrafts that are currently flying.
Can you list the aircrafts that are in the air at this moment?
Provide a list of all the aircrafts being monitored by Flight Radar.
What are the aircrafts that are currently being tracked?

parameters.name: airline
parameters.description:
The value of 'icao' field returned in .../airlines/list or .../flights/detail endpoint
The value of 'operator' field returned in .../flights/search endpoint

utterances.utterance: Can you list all flights operated by Delta Airlines?
Show me the flights for American Airlines.
What flights are currently being operated by United Airlines?
List all the flights for Southwest Airlines.
Can you provide the flight details for British Airways?
Show me the flights operated by Lufthansa.

List all flights for Qatar Airways.

What flights are being operated by Singapore Airlines?

api_methods.name: flights/get-playback
api_methods.description: Get history traveling data of specific flight

parameters.name: flightId
parameters.description: Value of 'id' OR 'identification/id' field returned in .../flights/detail or .../flights/get-more-info endpoint

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Value of 'departure' field returned in .../flights/detail OR .../flights/get-more-info endpoint

utterances.utterance: Can you get the playback data for flight ID 2b5accad with timestamp 1648874400?
What is the history of flight 3c4d5e6f at timestamp 1650000000?
Retrieve the playback information for flight 1a2b3c4d with timestamp 1649000000.
Show me the travel history for flight 5e6f7g8h at timestamp 1649500000.
Get the playback data for flight 9a8b7c6d with timestamp 1649600000.
What is the playback information for flight 2f3g4h5i at timestamp 1649700000?
Retrieve the history of flight 6g7h8i9j with timestamp 1649800000.
Can you show the playback data for flight 3h4i5j6k at timestamp 1649900000?
Get the travel history for flight 7i8j9k0l with timestamp 1650100000.
What is the playback information for flight 4j5k6l7m at timestamp 1650200000?

api_methods.name: flights/get-more-info
api_methods.description: Get more information of specific aircraft, flight, airline, etc...

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The value of registration (if fetchBy is 'reg') or default (if fetchBy is 'flight') field returned in .../flights/detail

parameters.name: fetchBy
parameters.description:
One of the following : reg|flight
* reg is used to get specific aircraft info, flight is used to get specific flight or airline info

utterances.utterance: Can you get more information about the flight with registration number N12345?
I need details about the flight with the number AA123.
Please fetch information for the aircraft registered as G-ABCD.
Can you provide more details about the flight DL456?
I want to know more about the aircraft with registration F-GHIJ.
Get me information about the flight UA789.
Can you fetch details for the aircraft registered as N67890?
I need more information about the flight BA321.
Please get details for the aircraft with registration C-DEFG.
Can you provide more information about the flight LH123?

api_methods.name: flights/detail
api_methods.description: Get detailed information of specific flight

parameters.name: flight
parameters.description: The value of id, flight_id field returned in .../flights/list-in-boundary or .../flights/list-most-tracked endpoint

utterances.utterance: Can you provide detailed information for flight ID 2b5ae17f?
What are the details of the flight with ID 3c6df29a?
I need information about flight 4d7ef38b.
Please get me the details for flight 5e8fc49c.
Could you track flight 6f9gd5ad for me?
Show me the details of flight 7a0he6be.
I want to know more about flight 8b1if7cf.
Can you provide the flight details for 9c2jg8dg?
What’s the status of flight 0d3kh9eh?
Get me the information for flight 1e4li0fi.

api_methods.name: flights/list-most-tracked
api_methods.description: Return the most tracked flights around the world

utterances.utterance: What are the most tracked flights around the world right now?
Can you show me the list of the most popular flights being tracked globally?
Which flights are currently the most tracked worldwide?
Give me the list of the most tracked flights in the world at the moment.
What flights are people tracking the most globally?
Show me the most tracked flights around the world.
Can you provide the list of the most tracked flights worldwide?
Which flights are the most popular to track globally right now?
What are the top tracked flights around the world currently?
List the most tracked flights in the world at this time.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Aircraft number, flight code, airline code, etc...

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items per response (max 25)

utterances.utterance: Can you find information about flight AA123?

api_methods.name: airlines/list
api_methods.description: List all airlines around the world

utterances.utterance: Can you list all the airlines around the world?
Show me a list of all global airlines.
Provide a comprehensive list of airlines worldwide.

List every airline in the world.

api_methods.name: airports/list
api_methods.description: List all airports around the world

utterances.utterance: Can you list all the airports in the world?
